name: Morto: Chapter 1
description:
Morto is a heavy and enigmatic game that focuses on a psychological horror story with a hand-drawn and animated aesthetic. The game is being created in a structure of chapters that will be released over time. In it you control a mysterious character and can walk and interact with objects in a 2D view, finding tense scenes and also trying to find out more about the story by exploring the environments, this game focuses heavily on the theme of depression so it should be avoided by those who have this predisposition.
Warning: This game has a theme that should be avoided by people with depression problems.

name: Skippy the Bot
description:
This game was made to celebrate AM2R's 5th anniversary, and it's based on a brief sequence where you remotely control a robot. In this puzzle physics platformer, you'll be challenged to complete 10 hand crafted levels. It's a short experience, that makes it very appealing to try speed running, or other challenges:

Can you complete the game while collecting all the gems?
Can you complete the game without collecting any gems at all?
How about a deathless run?

Have fun!

name: Reflections of Life: Meridiem - Collector's Edition
description: Fate hangs in the balance!

name: Descent: Legends of the Dark
description: To play the Descent: Legends of the Dark board game, one player must download the free Descent: Legends of the Dark app on a compatible device. This companion app determines the setup of each quest, tracks your party’s inventory, skills, progress, and resolves combat while telling a narrative story.

name: Razenroth 2
description: Razenroth 2 is a dark action game with RPG and roguelike elements. Enter a randomly generated world of nightmares and fight with an army of dangerous monsters.

name: Life Can Be Amazing
description: “Life Can Be Amazing” is an uplifting Yuri Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Dating Sim. Play as this seasoned chef as she seeks to rediscover her culinary talent and inspiration by taking a trip down to the Caribbean.

name: Rescuer
description: Ryan is a former military man who receives a job offer as a private security guard, when he arrives in Rutianland, Ryan realizes that there is something wrong, everyone is the same, as if they were robots.

name: LogScape: Puzzle Game
description: Paul Bunyan is locked up in the enchanted woods. Help him solve puzzles by moving the red wooden block out of the box. Over hundreds of puzzles to play from. Can you be the puzzle master and help Paul Bunyan escape?

name: Mahjong Masters
description: Mahjong Masters is a classic mahjong game with over 300 puzzle boards to solve. Match two of a kind to empty the whole board to progress to the next. Change background and tiles to your preferences and choose from a variety of backgrounds and tiles. Complete the daily challenges and have fun!

name: Eternal Cave Escape
description: Eternal Cave Escape is a precision-platformer that challenges players to climb their way out of a cave using a pickaxe. Mistakes in this cave cost the player time rather than lives, as all progress can be lost through falling. Will you rise out of this seemingly endless cave, or will you be stuck here forever?

name: Ramiel
description:
Ramiel is a short game about wings, hope, and living in a body that is very clearly not your own.

It's a game for the angels in our lives who just can't bear living without their wings any longer.

One day, we will all find our wings.

name: Hidden Dream
description: “Hidden Dream” is a game about puzzle, exploration and collection in horizontal version. In this game, players are supposed to participate in the story about how did Princess Wencheng complete her journey to Tibet that for getting marry with Srongtsen Gampo in Princess Wencheng’s fantasy world.

name: Evorales
description: Defeat the gnu-demon and his army and save the day in this top-down bullet hell focused on slowdown and bullet time mechanics. Easy to play but hard to master, it requires great strategy if you aim for a hi-score while dodging bullets across 12 hand-drawn, steampunk aesthetic stages.

name: LowPolyExplorer
description: Explore moons, asteroids and planets in a low poly universe with your rover! Explore to upgrade your rover and go further into the Universe to discover and see new environnements and species. Each planet is unique and modelize by hand.

name: Pirates vs monkeys
description: In the game you have to control a combat cannon and launch various projectiles at the fortified positions of monkeys

name: Colors!
description: Minimalist and intuitive puzzle game with relax music.

name: Park Rangers of the Undead
description: A fun, easy to play combat game where you shoot, blast, or build to your hearts content as you beat wave after wave of zombies.

name: Obscura
description: Obscura is a puzzle-platformer in which the player uses different cameras to find colorful solutions to problems in a monochromatic world.

name: Kelvin and The Chateau
description: My mother and I were the only survivors from the fire incident, while our home was destroyed. Why me, the one born as an illegitimate child? You'll play as Kelvin, a high-school student who seeks for the meaning of life.

name: Cats: Classic Onet Connect
description: Cats - Classic Onet Connect is a super fun matching game with cool challenges and brain teasers! Enjoy hours of fun connecting lovely images of cute cats, delicious fruits and sweets. Test your skills by matching and linking the same kind images and work your way up to victory!

name: 中华富甲三国
description: Sin descripción

name: Aspiring Light
description: The world is a messed up place. But it's all a blip on the radar to Aiden, who's got his own problems to worry about. Things like, what the answer to that last math problem was. Trying to keep his friendships afloat before it's too late. And just wondering what the future has in hold for him...

name: I Am Human!
description: I Am Human! is an intelligence gathering bluffing party game where one of the players is a disguised alien impostor that has infiltrated the group of humans for an upcoming alien invasion of Earth. Players take turns interrogating each other to try and unmask who among them is the alien impostor.

name: Piffsy
description: Piffsy is a Free-to-Play Social MMO where you can explore, play, build, socialize & much much more in a brand new massively multiplayer open world!

name: Hunter Girls
description: Hunter Girls is an action-packed 2D running platformer. Prince Alex has been kidnapped, and now three beautiful girls set out to rescue him. Each has a different reason for starting this adventure that you will discover as you meet each; adventurous Agnes, stern Kim, and shy Flora.

name: Mandacaru
description: Mandacaru is a hypercasual game where you match the seeds and harvest it to play a tetris-like subgame while the clock is ticking, so try to be the faster farmer!

name: Apopia
description: APOPIA is a comedic adventure with dark mysteries. Help young girl Mai to find her way home. Progress by solving puzzles and outsmarting enemies in minigames. Make friends and foes with talking animals. Unravel the mystery of Mai’s identity from her dark and blurry memories.

name: Race Track Driver
description: Join your personal Driving Tutor at the Race Track today! Follow his advice to earn your license and get promoted to the Race Team as a Test Driver! Take control of 16 High Performance Cars and complete various Tests of Driving Skills and Advanced Car Control to earn your Racing License.

name: Don't Cut Your Hand 2
description: Chef can't work without his hand. So, please cut food carefully.

name: Misery Street
description: Join Emo on his adventure through a dark and treacherous world to find the meaning of his life...

name: Super Onion Boy 2
description: Super Onion Boy 2 is a 2D adventure game in retro style platformer. Defeat enemies on the way with the help of superpowers and epic transformations, collect coins and stars to earn extra lives, find chests with magic potions and defeat all the terrible bosses until you reach the final boss.

name: The Elysian Field
description: A gorgeous 3rd person casual adventure game centred around a dying soldier wondering through the elysian field witnessing the final moments of those already gone before leaving his own final mark. Uncover memories and a final conversation before laying to rest.

name: Women of Xal
description: A political intrigue visual novel with romanceable elements. Player decisions weigh heavy as consequences can easily lead to hurt and trouble.

name: Zenko: A Fox's Tale
description: Zenko: A Fox's tale is a 3D adventure platformer that takes place in a Japanese inspired environment. A whimsical fox must move between realms to capture wandering spirits, discover new abilities, and restore an abandoned shrine.

name: Exp!A
description: Create a wonderful amusement park with the innocent boy Ash. Tell him the idea you came up with and Ash will build an amusement park based on that idea. You may be asked for a lot of EXP when you make something or make friends with someone. But there are many more EXPs. rest assured. Welcome to the other side of the end roll. This is a story to give to "you" who was once the main character.

name: Accident on the Simple Rd
description: Social deduction party game about Civilians and Maniacs. Civilians have to repair the school bus or sniff out and expulse all Maniacs with limited supplies. Maniacs have to prevent Civilians to complete their goals.

name: Almost My Floor
description:
Almost my floor - classic point&click adventure with horror atmosphere. Alex (main character) is a simple man who lives a simple life. But one day everything will change. Is he actually so simple?
This story tells about a long way to home. Through child fears, on an edge of fiction and reality. There is no way back if you step into the elevator. A common day turned adventure, from which Alex has to get out.

name: Puzzle Girls: Lingerie
description: Join the all girls Dark Research Club and learn about your inner powers and help to bring forth everything you can ever want for yourself.

name: Goroons
description: Morph. Act. Together. Save your planet! "These lovable creatures need to work together and stop the destruction of their planet!"

name: Satori
description: SATORI is a flow-inducing first-person platformer -- wall-run, air-dash, grapple-swing, and rail-grind through infinitely generated open worlds and experience the freedom of meditative free-running.

name: Brave Hand
description: Brave Hand is an award-winning original single-player card game about pushing your luck. Beautifully simple yet deeply strategic. Playing unlocks the story of the Wanderer and the Guardian, depicted across 16 gorgeous hand-painted theme pages. An elegant design that combines the simplicity of classic card games like Solitaire and War, and the strategy of collectible card games.

name: Windah Horror Adventure
description: In this 3D top-down horror game, you play as Windah Basudara, a popular Indonesian YouTuber who gets trapped in a world of Indonesian urban legends. Your goal is to escape and survive the game's many obstacles, including traps and bosses in the form of Indonesian ghosts.

name: DC: Batman Bat-Tech Edition
description: The ultimate augmented reality Batman mobile experience, featuring Bat-Tech STEM-inspired stories, mini-games, stickers, and more. Travel through Gotham City in a way that’s never been done before - augmented reality. Learn how to use Batman’s unique technology, take on challenges against Batman’s most evil adversaries, and play Batman versions of fan favorite mobile games.

name: MordeTwi Magic
description: MordeTwi Magic is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on the MordeTwi fanship and 2012 fanart by joeyairplanes02 featuring the ship which would later become a meme. The mod features a full song mapping of the song Airplanes.

name: Friday Night Fever: Frenzy
description: You're Fever, the mayor of Fever Town! A trip back from space caused you to crash here instead of home, and things began to pile up on your desk ever since. Once an abandoned spot on the map, it's now a hot spot for the world's rejects, criminals, scumbags and any others shunned from their homes. Your girlfriend is also from space, and you're hiding some dark secrets from her... can you handle a relationship as well as you can handle being a mayor?

name: Sunnyside vs. the Eggies
description:
Sunnyside is a farmer who lives in Monkey World. One day he goes outside to pick from
his banana trees only to be levitated up from the ground and abducted by egg aliens.
Filled with rage and egg hatred he must make his way through floor after floor of the
mothership. Blasting egg aliens and spilling their yolk all over the walls in this endless
sidescrolling shoot-em-up roguelike!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Ketsui - Kizuna Jigoku-tachi DX
description:
The bonds I have with my friends will not let go even if I fall into hell. ``New authentic shooting'' where you fight with determination in your heart.

The year is 2054. Behind the endless wars is a company called ``EVAC Industry'' that exports weapons all over the world. The United Nations begins negotiations with EI, but EI completely rejects the proposal for a ``total ban on arms imports and exports.''
With no progress being made, the United Nations abandoned negotiations and secretly decided to intervene with force.

The mission is to ``destroy EI's weapons and development facilities'' and ``destroy everything related to UN military intervention.'' Even if the operation is successful, they will not be allowed to return home alive. There were four young people who volunteered for this harsh special mission.

Select an aircraft from two types of teams: TYPE-A (WAY SHOT type) and TYPE-B (LINEAR SHOT type). Normal bullets, lock shots, and bombs. Make full use of 3 types of attack methods and overwhelm the hell of barrage and weapons.

Also supports online rankings for each difficulty level. Take on the world with determination in your chest, even if you're willing to die.

name: Ghosted
description: The town of Falling Springs is a dreamy slice of small-town Americana: quiet, beautiful, neighborly, quaint. But within the neighborhood lies a secret of supernatural proportions, and its unveiling will bring your love life back from the dead. Literally.

name: MistWorld the after
description:
Get unique item drops from countless numbers of monsters!
A classic-style 3D exploration RPG!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 5
description:
Special Song Arrangement Pack Vol. 5 is here, and it's filled with hits!
Popular songs by Amane-san and beatMario like "Shiawase Usagi" and rhythm game favorite, "Hakanakimono Ningen," as well as the overseas hit, "Tiny Little Adiantum" are all included in this special variety pack!

name: Spektakl: Banned Edition
description:
\SPEK.TAKL\ is a a first-person psychological horror game with multiple endings that can be completed in under an hour.

It is a late-night television watching simulator. Sit down on the couch in your new apartment straight out of 1994 and enjoy a cozy evening bingeing cable TV until the sign-off comes around and there's nothing else to watch.

Whatever you do, do not worry about the neighbors; do NOT answer the door; and never EVER watch the VHS tapes that are dropped through your mail slot.

\SPEK.TAKL\ is an intense, intimate and disturbing horror-themed psychosexual exploration on the lengths some of us go to in order to avoid facing the inevitable.

name: Rabbids: Party of Legends
description: Embark on a legendary journey with the Rabbids in this hilarious party game! Join them on an incredible quest, filled with hilarious moments and colorful characters.

name: Pierhead Arcade 2
description:
Pierhead Arcade 2 is the sequel to the popular indie Virtual Reality arcade simulator.
Relive your childhood spent at the arcade on the pier but this time with unlimited tokens!
Pierhead Arcade is back with all new VR physics based arcade games to play!

name: Trials of Midnight
description: Recruit nightmare minions to battle your way out of a child's dreamland!

name: Battle Calculator
description:
A game that is fun to play together and uses your brain a little.
Your calculation skills, knowledge of functions, and reflexes will be tested.
Rules of the game
1. You can use only 0〜9,0.1〜0.9.
2. Make the number by using the four arithmetic operations and so on.
3. The first is the winner.

name: Murus
description: A hardcore speedrunning platformer where you cannot touch the ground!

name: Disc Ninja
description: Disc Ninja is a Virtual Reality disc golf game set in a magical version of Feudal Japan. The goal is to reach the target with a flying disc in as few throws as possible. The game combines realistic physics with beautiful, stylized graphics.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes the game and Ultimate Pack, which contains the Berserker Gear Pack, Berserker Settlement Pack, and more!

Become Eivor, a legendary Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory. Explore a dynamic open world set against the brutal backdrop of England's Dark Ages. Raid your enemies, grow your clan's settlement, and build your political power on a quest for glory.

name: Watch Dogs: Legion - Deluxe Edition
description:
Enhance your Watch Dogs: Legion experience with the Deluxe Pack.

In Watch Dogs: Legion, you get to build a resistance to take back a near-future London that is facing its downfall.

name: Arcade Archives: Bio-Ship Paladin
description: Bio-Ship Paladin is a shooting game released by UPL in 1990. Players use a variety of weapons to defeat bosses, including a main weapon with charge and chain shots, beams that fire toward a crosshairs, and power-ups that enlarge your ship.

name: Rhyther
description: Rhyther is a small Rhythm Game inspired by Friday Night Funkin, Created by CodeCloth (Now known as SpinnableBlue) in 2021 and released on GameJolt on August 5th 2021.

name: FlyChivements
description: Play and have fun in the new game that has no analogues! Try to get your hands on all our achievements!

name: The Adventures of Dinobot and Tiara!
description: Ever wanted to help a kitten and a triceratops collect a plethora of magic flying candy? If so... wow, did you luck out at finding this game! The Adventures of Dinobot and Tiara is obviously something you need in your life!

name: Game about games
description: GAG is a new way to talk about games. Episode No. 1: Dying Light and freedom.

name: Gamer Girls 2
description: This is a casual block game. There are 10 different scenes with little stories. You can move figures to pass the level and you will unlock the girl’s stories and dynamic CGs.

name: Blood of the Alchemists
description: All magic in the world is lost, and only one hope remains, the alchemists. Craft, brew, explore, and discover the mysteries of the past in this stand-alone sequel to Tales from Evenfall. The magical fate of the world is in your hands.

name: Hell's Island
description: "Hell's Island" is a pc island survival game, based on a island in the blue Caribbean waters where you are stranded and need to gather resources to build and survive.

name: Mir 4
description: Mir 4 is a free-to-play open world Asian-fantasy MMORPG that can be cross-played on both PC and mobile devices. Mir 4 is full of action and features numerous large scale clan PVP battles. Join now and become a legend.

name: Watashi no Kokoro! Kimi no Koto ga Suki desu.
description: Watashi no Kokoro! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Tyfortress: Tactical Typing
description: Protect human race last fortress against the robots by typing phrases and single words! Build and evolve towers that will help while you destroy robots by typing their words! Oh, and don't forget... Before that, you'll need to type phrases fast to gather a good amount of resources to build towers!

name: 汉字大冒险
description: Sin descripción

name: Gun Gun Create
description: プレイヤーは店の店主となって依頼者の様々な要望に応えます。 依頼者と会話を進めていく中で、何が必要か、どんな状況かを推理し、 それに合った銃をカスタマイズしていきます。

name: Escape to Mars
description: A game with inspirations like Pac-Man, Escape To Mars is a game about Action, puzzle and abilites require good tempo of player for collect all points.

name: Ships at War
description: A physics-based strategy game with player-made warships and submarines. Build the most effective warships and use them to sink the enemy during battles. Conquer the ocean by deploying your ships in strategic locations on the sea in round-based scenarios.

name: 123 Dots
description: The game includes more than 150 educational activities for your child to learn while having fun. 123 Dots also helps children develop important basic skills such as creativity, basic skills, attention span and memory. 123 Dots entertains toddlers while they learn numbers from 1 to 20 with its fun and friendly Dots. In addition to teaching numbers and counting, your children can learn geometric shapes, basic skills, the alphabet and sequences. All in one!

name: My Friend Pedro: Ripe for Revenge
description: My Friend Pedro is back in a brand new mobile adventure of blood, bullets and bananas! Flip and fire your way through 37 action packed levels on foot, on a motorcycle and even on a skateboard. Plan your high caliber choreography for the best scores and, if your skin is tough enough, test your skills in Blood Rush mode.

name: Dark Roll: Free Kick Challenge
description: A ball rolling game, where you take football free kicks. Single player challenges, Steam Leaderboards and ranked multiplayer. Free to play.

name: Gems of Magic: Father's Day
description: Remove all obstacles and reunite father and son in 100 challenging levels! In this exciting and adventurous match-3 based puzzle game you will have lots of fun!

name: Yellow Ballman
description: Yellow Ballman is a high speed 2D action game where you control a ball-shaped character. Your goal is to reach the end while avoiding needles and other gimmicks.

name: Eluxia Enigma
description: Eluxia Enigma is a platformer exploration game where you arrive on the planet of Eluxia, a planet riddled with gravitational anomalies. Master the gravity in this platformer with a twisted perspective!

name: Star Hunter DX
description: Betrayed by her cut-throat crew, Luna Starr - former Space Pirate Captain turned bounty hunter - has a score to settle. As Luna, travel to 5 exotic planets to track down your mutinous mates, and face them in Bullet Hell dogfights to the death!

name: Dodgeball Academia
description: A sports RPG game featuring rookie dodgeball student, Otto. Join Otto and an eclectic cast of characters as they train to dominate on and off the courts of the academia.

name: Block Slime Cave
description: Let's aim for the goal by using the block slime that lives in the cave and the characteristic that you can jump big when you ride.

name: Android
description: Android is a 2D platformer very similar to Brøderbund’s classic Lode Runner.

name: VR Mad Asylum
description: Escape in 45 minutes. Complete Virtual Reality Game Play. Terrible events take place in an old mental asylum. The crazy doctor is doing crazy experiments. But where it leads?

name: Picross S: Genesis & Master System Edition
description: Select characters have been chosen to debut as Picross puzzles from Sega's classic consoles, the Master System and Sega Genesis!

name: Stride
description: STRIDE is a story parkour action game in virtual reality. Battle enemies in the canopy of a quarantined metropolis. Experience the feeling of vertigo as you stream between rooftops and flow across balconies in your effort to save the city.

name: Starmancer
description: Starmancer is a space station building game offering gameplay with consequences, a living sandbox environment, crafting, and managing the daily lives of colonists. Send crews out to mine on asteroids, trade with other factions, and explore old alien ruins. Obey protocol or go rogue as you take on the role of a powerful A.I.. Build bustling space ports, secret laboratories, and incubators for mysterious eggs. Defend against starvation, sabotage, and space zombies. Don't worry, you can always grow more humans. The vastness of space awaits. Are you ready?

name: Jupiter Hell
description: Jupiter Hell is a classic turn-based roguelike set in a 90's flavored sci-fi universe. Rip and tear zombies, demons and unmentionable monstrosities, using shotguns, chainguns and the trusty chainsaw, to the shine of CRT monitors and the tune of heavy metal!

name: Death Trash
description: Death Trash features a post-apocalyptic world where cosmic horrors long for humanity but meet punks with shotguns. It combines old-school role-playing, modern action gameplay and player freedom. Create your own character and explore a handcrafted world.

name: Meow Cat Village
description:
A passive game where hearts gather even when you're idle!
Collect hundreds of decorating items.
Welcome even cuter cats with costumes.
The more you decorate, the more diverse and unique customers come.
Decorate the garden, harvest vegetables, and open a beachside restaurant!

name: Sucker Punch 2
description: Sucker Punch 2 contains nine small, single-player maps for Doom II. The maps require a limit-removing port. The WAD is made up from three mini-episodes of three maps each which escalate from easy (with green details) to harder (yellow) to hardest (red). These are slightly larger than the maps in the original Sucker Punch (2018), and should mostly take 3-5 minutes each to play. Difficulty settings are implemented. The maps are designed for pistol starts.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh
description: Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh mini-expansion was introduced in Update 50. An evil Alchemist's mansion stands alone on a cliff and mysterious lights and hauntings have kept people away despite rumors of great treasure.

name: TicTako
description: Tic-Tac-Toe but it's on Ina's forehead and the loser faces her divine punishment.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 13
description: Season 13 will introduce a series of updates to the recently released Taego map, which is set in 1980s South Korea. Chief among these updates is the introduction of the Taego Secret Room, which will randomly spawn on the map and contains some of the best gear Survivors can find. However, players will have to discover a secret key before they can access the Secret Room!

name: Jump Squared
description:
Jump Squared is a 2d platformer currently with 3 levels and your favorite main character - random blue square!

Expect multiple updates after the initial release. I am planning on adding local leaderboards, extensive settings - not to mention a 4th level to properly finish the game.

name: Beached
description: Beached is a completely free to play experience, where your only goal is to SURVIVE. You must take on these challenges on by defending your base, scavenging various POI's (point of interests) around the map. Fight off animals, other players... and a strange force that lays in the sea...

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Lone Wolf
description:
Includes:
- "Clyde" hero unlock
- "Lone Wolf" outfit
- "Claws" weapon
- 700 Crowns

name: F-Sim: Space Shuttle 2
description: Each flight starts at either 10,000 feet, already aligned with the runway, or at up to 50,000 feet, before banking into the heading alignment cone. During descent, the Orbiter is an unpowered glider, so you will only have one chance to get it right. Astronauts used to call it a flying brick: because of its 200,000 lbs. gross weight and low lift over drag ratio, the approach is six times steeper and two times faster than a typical airliner approach. After your first safe touchdown, chase that perfect landing, compare your high scores online with your friends, earn medals, and unlock achievements. Experiment with different wind conditions, night approaches, and even emergency scenarios or system failures. At the end of each flight, watch a replay from different camera angles.

name: Tokyo Run
description: Tokyo Runner is an endless runner game, in the city of Tokyo where you won't lose. Avoid collisions with sumoists, collect coins.

name: Castle of Pixel Skulls DX
description: Castle Of Pixel Skulls is a fun retro-styled platformer filled with fun and crazy hurdles. Play challenging levels in a race against time in order to escape. Will you have what it takes to survive?

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP046
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC include map pack 046.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP047
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC include map pack 047.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP049
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC include map pack 049.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP044
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC include map pack 044.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP050
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC include map pack 050.

name: Tiger Striker: MP025
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. Player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 025.

name: Tiger Striker: MP029
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. Player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 029.

name: Tiger Striker: MP027
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. Player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 027.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP004
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 004.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP005
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 005.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP003
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 003.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP002
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 002.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP001
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 001.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora! MP001
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy Navy Cruiser\Battleship\Aircraft Carrier to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 001.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora! MP002
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy Navy Cruiser\Battleship\Aircraft Carrier to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 002.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP046
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 046.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP047
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 047.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP049
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 049.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP048
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 048.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP050
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 050.

name: Abyss Vein
description: This is an open world sandbox game. Currently, it's the first big release. The content of the game includes: domestication, genes, relics, excavation, building, construction and theft

name: Hentai Jigsaw Girls 2
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring naked hentai girls by LineArtBabe, on an anime styled background.

name: Sudokolorful
description: Sudokolorful is a color-based puzzle game (suitable for color blindness) which reinvents the classic Sudoku game. Instead of numbers, play with colors! Challenge your brain with different types of Sudoku: 4x4, 6x6 and 9x9, each one with easy, medium and hard difficulties.

name: Cat Attack
description: Cat Attack - 2d Side Scroller - Shooter, a game about a dog trying to fight off an army of cats who are not happy that food was taken from them.

name: 冰嬉图卷
description: 2022北京冬奥会在即，本团队基于 Unity 手绘复原《冰嬉图》卷。作品共设置五大主线交互点与若干支线交互点，涵盖文字、图片、视频、3D 展示、射击游戏、情景问答、DIY、拼图等多种交互形式，使用户了解古代冰雪运动的历史知识，唤起用户对冰雪运动的热爱。

name: Sin-Cay
description: A sci-fi adventure with shooter and puzzle elements. The game follows the adventures of Shin-kai, a half-divine creature animated by ancient magic in an uncharted and mysterious world. The story begins in 1959 in the Soviet Union, in a place called "the mountain of the dead".

name: Chrs 143
description: Discover the physics of a mysterious 2D tile-based universe, including ballistics, fluid mechanics, thermodynamics, chemical and nuclear reactions. Use automation bricks, build structures, machines, vehicles, produce power, solve puzzles, pierce the fog and defeat Chrs!

name: Power & Revolution: 2021 Edition
description: A new expansion of the ultra-realistic simulator of today's world where you play as the head of state or as the opposition! New Features for 2021: administration of the EU, Covid vaccinations, Biden's Challenge, political coalitions, diplomatic negotiations, worldwide tax and free-trade agreements.

name: Drama
description: An exciting game, full of traps and mysteries to be solved in each of its 96 levels. In this hostile story you must put all your skills to the test to solve the hidden enigmas and lead Frank to the end of this compelling story in 2D.

name: County Hospital
description: County Hospital is a singleplayer offline psychological horror inmersive game with jumpscares and high quality assets. Paranormal activity is happening, gather as much evidence as you can and try to scape from the building without getting caught. Are you brave enough?

name: Zerone 2D
description: An abstract arcade game with dozens of relaxing levels and optional challenges.

name: Code Zero
description: Code Zero is a counter strike-inspired 5 vs 5 tactical shooter where each team has a set amount of lives before they are eliminated and the round is lost. Code Zero puts an emphasis on team coordination and precise gunplay.

name: BullyBall
description: How long can you stand against evolution itself? Grab the bow, shot'em all. As long as you can. But whatever your strategy is - it can't withstand in a skirmish against endlessly evolving sets of balls. Can't it?

name: Rings of Hell
description: Rival professional wrestlers Red and Blue die in the ring and reawaken in Wrestle Hell, a pro-wrestling themed purgatory run by the devil herself: Wrestle Satan. The duo must prove their ability to work together in Active-Time-Battle matches on their quest to become champions of the Rings of Hell.

name: Hexagon World
description: Hexagon World is a God simulation game where you control the world.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura
description: Touhou Danmaku Kagura is a mobile rhythm game. It will be the first dedicated Touhou arrangement rhythm game to be released on smartphones and with gacha mechanics. The rhythm game session will be presenting the character having a danmaku battle against an opponent with a beatmap on the foreground. The player must beat the song played in the battle without missing too many beats.

name: The Falconeer: Warrior Edition
description: The Falconeer: Warrior Edition includes the fully updated game, plus 'The Hunter' DLC, adding a new player class with a flyable Ormir dragon and a set of pyro pot guided rockets, and the new 'Edge of the World' DLC, containing 3 additional side quests and new boss encounters. Experience the free-flying escapism of flying a giant warbird across a stunning open world. Discover a vast oceanic world filled with lost myths and breathtaking landscapes. Soar above the clouds and engage in spectacular aerial dogfights. Join and support your faction, taking on missions that may change the fate of your comrades as well as your own.

name: Haven Park
description: Be Flint, who is doing his best to keep his grandma's park up and running and make it a place for the campers to enjoy. Learn the camper's wishes and build whatever their hearts desire to attract even more quirky characters and look forward to whimsical conversations and quests.

name: Orbals
description: Orbals is a fast-paced, rolling adventure puzzle game with wonderful graphics and sound. Quickly solve puzzles to master the Mojometer, find new Orbals characters and unlock special abilities.

name: Secret of the Rendrasha Blade
description: A classic JRPG at heart, but with modern game design elements baked in, with a ton of secrets, hidden humor, easter eggs, and questionable / offensive choices to be made.

name: Toodee and Topdee
description: A cosmic turbulence caused the 2D Platformer and the Top-Down Puzzler dimensions to merge! Switch between Toodee and Topdee and their unique perspectives to overcome hard-as-nails challenges, solve mind-melting puzzles and defeat huge bosses. Oh, and there's a co-op mode!

name: Pokémon Sword and Shield
description: As the name suggests, this ROM attempts to adapt the story and region from the GBA Pokémon Sword and Shield games.

name: Sloanysoft C64 SEUCK Games
description: These games were made in the 80s on a Commodore 64, using Palace Software's Shoot'Em Up Construction Kit. Sloany made these back when he was about 11 or 12. The tapes were found some years later & preserved for posterity as TAP files.

name: Adult Moolah Nitwit Terrapins
description: Embarrassing name aside, this is another vertically-scrolling, run-and-gun shooter, this time staring Terrapins, that may or may not bear a striking resemblance to other be-shelled pizza loving reptiles.

name: Sloany vs. Reggie
description: Take the role of Sloany or his mate Reggie as they plod through a load of bad guys that loosely resemble whatever he was into at the time – ninjas, batman, arcade machines, Subbuteo players, Pac-Man etc.

name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 1
description:
Mario Party Legacy is a website for people to create custom boards for the Mario Party games released for the Nintendo 64.

This modpack is a selection of 4 of the custom boards for the first Mario Party, selected to be featured on RetroAchievements.

The first volume contains:

- Snowflake Lake by SuperZambezi
- Constellation Chaos by MikesMonsterGaming
- Rainbow Road by NintendoFan
- Minecraft Mayhem by Professor C-Dawg

name: Chronicles of Ghost Town
description: Chronicles of Ghost Town is a episode of respectable size for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Ft. Minecraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Endeavor
description: Endeavor is the first & only FDA-authorized video game treatment for inattention for kids 8-12 with with primarily inattentive or combined-type ADHD. Access to treatment in the game requires a prescription from your child's healthcare provider. If you receive a prescription for EndeavorRx, our pharmacy partner, PhilRx, will send you an activation code to activate treatment.

name: Pokémon Sors
description: The sequel to Pokémon Saiph, another Pokémon FireRed ROM hack.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Claws
description:
Long time familiar game mechanics will be transformed with this update! A new looting and inventory interface, changed Dark Zone mechanics, more user friendly ammo boxes instead of clips and magazines.

New weapons, outfits, tombstones with astonishing effects will make this season fun, and all those new things you can test in the “Game of Crowns” - where everyone is hunting the one.

name: Ghost Case
description: The Ghost Case is the fourth episode of the Hidden Town escape game series. You will have to go through different parts of the city investigating and looking for clues that will help you solve the mysterious case. Interview the suspects involved and discover the murderer.

name: Neon City Riders: Super-Powered Edition
description:
Players can look forward to an easier default difficulty, with an extra challenge relegated to “Old-School” mode. Navigation has also been enhanced while updating the UI. There are some other changes as well.

Here’s the full rundown:
- New Difficulty
By default, Neon City Riders’ enemies, hazards, puzzles, checkpoint locations and map designs were re-balanced to be more accessible.

And, if you are a fan of challenges, like we do, the new option “Old-School mode” is available to increase the overall difficulty of your quest.

- Enhanced Navigation
We introduce Cypher Kid, a chatty little robot who will gladly (and optionally) sell you maps for the different turfs to help you navigate its sections.

Also, your mentor, Evergray, will help you at the begging of each zone by pointing you at the right direction.

- Optional Flashy UI
Thinking on the players with light sensitivity, we decided to add a new option that turns on/off the fast paced colors in the user’s interface across the game to make their journey as comfy as possible.

In addition to this changes, tons of small improvements were added, and, If you already started your adventure, this changes will be compatible with your current save file.

name: SpiderPunks
description: SpiderPunks is a unique blend of three-game genres: Builder/Defense, Action, and Puzzle. Earn money and spend it on new spider's web connections. Buy new spiders or heal injured ones. Get experience to develop more spider's skills to fight against toxic soap bubbles.

name: Retired Men's Nude Beach Volleyball League
description:
Take to the court and match up against your opponent in physically and mentally challenging beach volleyball!

Retired Men's Nude Beach Volleyball is a single-player narrative-based volleyball game set in beautiful locations across Massachusetts. Join the league and play as Len Rizzo as he navigates the later part of life one serve at a time.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Mission 9: Return to Hell
description: This is the third and final mission in 'Return to Hell', a horrifying three-part Zombie Army 4: Dead War campaign! Explore the realm of the damned in this new 1-4 player mission, complete with horrifying enemies, collectibles and more! You've come this far, but can you live through hell itself?

name: The Keeper
description: The Keeper is a beautiful PS1 styled horror game that tells a tragic ghost story as you explore a mysterious abandoned lighthouse.

name: Raster Prime: Remix
description:
Raster Prime: Remix is a new edition of an original mobile game released in 2017.
Your mind will short-circuit in this atmospheric pixel sci-fi puzzler with eight levels of increasing difficulty. Decipher each binary sequence to travel further into the unknown, and unearth a deeper mystery that may never be fully understood.

name: GoBlaster
description: GoBlaster is a retro bullet-hell game where you can always beat your personal best. Blast through enemies while dodging their overwhelming attacks in a fast-paced and addictive setting. Make your way to the final boss, and just try to survive!

name: 太古情缘之青云剑侠传奇
description: Sin descripción

name: A Favor
description: A Favor is a 15-minute-long, first-person, narrative game experience with horror elements. Explore the apartment as you complete the chores laid out by your friend. Examine the environments to learn more about your friend and his secret. Discover the truth on where and who your friend is and why these strange occurrences happen.

name: Devil, It's me
description: Devil, It’s me is a game where you can build your own castle to defend against the waves of heroes set forth to defeat Magrandes.

name: Light Infantry
description: Play with Glitch

name: My Time Alive
description: In 2023, industry leading pharmaceutical company "HT Pharmaceuticals" found the complete cure for COVID-19, and they released the vaccine to the public. 9 months later, not much is left of mankind. Complete supply missions and conduct research studies to help find the cure to the infection.

name: Plumber 2
description: The Plumber 2 is a popular logical game, whose goal is to connect two water points in a short time to drain the water. This game has 30 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity, and the game is ideally suited for mobile devices.

name: Enter Digiton: Heart of Corruption
description: Take the role of one of Digiton's few survivors. Armed with only a shield and tasked with banishing the demon lords, it's up to you to explore the dark mysteries of the corrupted kingdom and restore its former glory. Uncover long-hidden secrets, and discover the truth behind the enigma known as an AHAB unit.

name: The Ramp
description: You crave for flow? You just want to shred through a halfpipe without all the boring stuff? Say no more, The Ramp is your jam!

name: Apex Legends: Emergence
description:
Meet a new legend: With microdrones and an artist's eye, Seer spots opportunities that other Legends might miss, and seizes them in the most beautiful way he can.

Season 10 also comes with new weapons, ranked arenas and new scenery.

name: Callparin 2
description: Callparin Island is a sun-drenched island with lots of jungle, beautiful beaches and an extremely hot desert in the center of the island. Callparin 2 offers a varied open world in third-person perspective, where you can interact with pretty much anything. There are numerous shops where you can buy and sell items. It is up to the player how the money is made. In addition, there is a lively underwater world that can be explored.

name: Here Comes Niko!
description: A 3D platformer using a cute paper-inspired artstyle in which you travel across an insland inhabited by animal people and do various activities like solve puzzles, chat or catch fish.

name: Svoboda 1945: Liberation
description:
The horrors of World War II are over, but peace never came to the Czech village of Svoboda. You were sent to investigate a decades-old feud. Who can you trust to explain what happened? How was your family involved? Talk to witnesses to uncover the troubled past.

Svoboda 1945: Liberation is a unique blend of adventure gameplay, full-motion video interviews with real actors and historically-accurate interactive memories of people who lived through the chaos of the aftermath of World War 2. Discover the secret history of your own family in a captivating story about reconciliation with the dark past.

name: Runes of Avalon 2
description:
Take a fantastic journey through a magical world as you match the runes to help Evelyne fulfil her mission and find her way home.

Welcome to the once glorious empire of Avalon, now clouded by the darkness of the evil Morganna's spells. After defeating Morganna in an intense magical battle, Evelyne, the protector of Avalon, must now cleanse Avalon from the dark curse with her Rune Magic. Help Evelyne to complete her mission and find her way home by matching the runes, encountering new locations, new spells and new challenges along the way. With three game modes and some unexpected twists, Runes of Avalon 2 takes you to an enchanting world of magic and mystery you won't want to leave.

Runes of Avalon 2 is a puzzle game with a twist, match-3 mechanic that you have yet to see.

*** Features: ***

- 100 great levels
- Amulet of Spells with 4 new spells
- 6 power-ups
- 10 new enchanting images to reveal
- Three game modes: Quest, Endless and Time Attack
- JigSaw mini-game
- Mystic music & sound effects

and more...

*** Discover more from Anawiki Games! ***

- The Perfect Tree
- Avalon Legends Solitaire HD
- Arizona Rose and the Pirates' Riddles HD
- Dress-Up Pups HD

You can always find an updated list at www.anawiki.com!

name: Squirreled Away
description: Sin descripción

name: The Distortion Beast
description:
In sleepy Coppersfield, a remote village on the coast of the Axelands, Maria of Cardo is offered a job. Coppersfield has been plagued by terrible attacks from an insidious and monstrous creature they call The Distortion Beast. The village elders want Maria of Cardo to explore the beat's lair, find it, and destroy it once and for all.

As Maria of Cardo, can you make the right choices, and truly defeat The Distortion Beast?

--

The Distortion Beast is an interactive fiction comic. Become Maria of Cardo, an adventurer who dives into the Lair of the Distortion Beast to rid the Axelands of this menace once and for all. Collect items, make choices, and try to defeat the beast!

name: Faceball 2000 DX
description: This is a color/enhancement hack of the technological marvel that is Faceball 2000. It features higher framerates, full color and fixed audio.

name: The Putrid Pumps
description: Large metal/runic industrial slime temple.

name: Bug: Beetles Underground
description: Bug: Beetles Underground is an open-world adventure game created in nine days for Game Jaaj 6, where you live in the life cycle of beetles known as true dung beetles - walk, roll, climb, fly, do quests, race, and upgrade.

name: Dobraminhos
description: Sin descripción

name: 100 Mystery Buttons
description:
Only 1 lets you escape!

100 Mystery Button Challenge is here! It is a super fun game with easy controls!

Find the only that lets you escape the box!
Tap on the buttons to trigger events that are either good or bad!

name: Angel Island Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Bugs
description: Lead a Bug's Life!

name: Couch Goblins
description: A local multiplayer obstacle course party game.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Shitass Full Week
description: Sin descripción

name: The Vaults
description: The Vaults is a turn-based RPG card game where you will engage with creatures and beings of other worlds, Explore powerful scrolls and weapons, find treasures, learn abilities, and upgrade your keepers to save the mysterious world of Alexandria!

name: Spectrum Valley
description: Spectrum Valley is an interactive experience that is part-exploration game and part music visualizer. Take control of a boy or girl character and run and jump around in several biomes, collecting coins or food bonuses as the world moves and reacts dynamically to an audio file on your system; affecting the ground beneath your feet, some objects, and even the weather.

name: Speedpunk: Last neo
description: Unlock new map Last neo!

name: Masked Ninja Action
description: Sin descripción

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - The African Royals
description: Dive into the heart of Africa as you explore a new continent for Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition with two brand new civilizations and their kingdoms, the Ethiopians and the Hausa!

name: Flippin Ninjas
description:
Flip through hazardous spikes and become a master Ninja!

No coins, no skins, no distractions! Just the high score counter and you vs. your worst enemy: YOU!

Simple, fun gameplay, difficult to master.

Happy Flippin'!

name: Zoelie
description: Zoelie is an action-puzzle platformer that tells the story of a young girl exploring her town of La Colina alongside her imagination-powered quilt, Sueño.

name: Little adventure 2
description: Little adventure 2 is a sequel to the adventure 2D platform game set in a fantasy world full of dangers and adventures. You have to play as an assistant to the blacksmith named Ben and go on a fun adventure, but this time alone!

name: Metal Faith
description: A 3D adventure puzzle game

name: Officespace
description: OFFICESCAPE is a first-person puzzle-platformer adventure game. In OFFICESCAPE you play as yourself, you are stuck in a dream and you are trying to wake up.

name: Hentai Brick Breaker 2
description: Unlock beautiful hentai scenes with boys and girls, hidden behind bricks that you must break. Choose your scenes and level from the gallery.

name: Disenchantment Heart
description: 祛魅·格心（祛魅3）是一款小清新像素风回合制角色扮演游戏，祛魅系列历代作品第三部。剧情故事发生在二代入灭事件结束后的东方异大陆。艰难的生存于市井之中酷爱讲鬼故事的贫苦少女，真情感动披坚执锐勇猛御敌的巡捕营参将？温婉善良双剑乖巧的少女能否寻得真凶手刃仇敌？由高人驯养获得真传的猫妖会成为合格的圣痕守护者吗？得传叶灵流刀法灵武士一生守护嗣潘王？喜欢蹂躏欺辱各种非人类生物的降妖师...不可描述？？？

name: Legend of Chilli Tree
description: Adventurous, explore-and-combat 2D game witch spicy storyline and wonderful sceneries. And of course, lots of deadly chilli peppers! Special focus is given to the fighting system inspired by Samurais and Ninjas with variety of moves, combos and tricks... Literally, the hottest fights ever!

name: Medium: The Psychic Party Game
description: In the game Medium, players act as psychic mediums, harnessing their powerful extra-sensory abilities to access other players’ thoughts. Together in pairs, they mentally determine the Medium: the word that connects the words on their two cards, and then attempt to say the same word at the same time!

name: Twin Balls
description: Twin Balls is an arcade scoring game.

name: In Search Of...
description: You are trapped in a room and the only rational thing is to open a safe, in the hope of being able to escape. Surely you were looking for something...

name: Fomalhaut Flowers
description: Go in search of rare flowers and uncover the terrible secret of Fomalhaut.

name: Splash Jump
description: Splash Jump - miniature arcade clicker game about jumping on platforms . Each click is a jump. Your task is to jumping and recruit points.

name: Cliché Adventure
description: Cliché Adventure is an open world top down adventure game. It can be played as single player, or with a friend. The game has five unique regions joined by a hub world. Each area contains an over world, a cave system, and a temple to explore. There are Six main boss fights, and twenty mini bosses.

name: Driving Simulator
description: Are you ready for a new challenge? Driving Simulator is a game that allows you to test the coolest super cars, motorcycles, boats, etc. on the most challenging maps.

name: Doggone Hungry
description: Doggone Hungry is a delicious game about eating food, getting fat, and being a dog. Your favorite toy, Quackerjack, is always getting stolen, and superior dog logic has determined that you must get fat to save him!

name: Evaverse
description: Welcome to the EVAVERSE, the next generation of social immersion platforms, empowering players to connect in a brand new metaverse world with mini-games!

name: Be the One
description: Can you defeat the endless Waves of Enemies while trying to improve your Highscore?

name: Venaitura
description: A retro RPG wherein you assemble a party of 4 Heroes from 12 Classes and embark on a journey to rid the world of Tsufana from the titular tower's corruption.

name: Dragon's Vengeance
description: Lead an elite group of heroes as they begin a treacherous journey to stop an exiled genius from becoming a tyrant, ruling a world filled with monsters and magic!

name: Rebel! Pure Love Fighters!
description: Gerard wants to be a hero like a brave, and childhood sweetheart Madilia discovers a terrifying conspiracy in the process of realizing their dreams. What kind of test will they face?

name: U.F.O. K.O. Tower Defense
description: Place lasers, missile launchers, sniper turrets, and use combat strategies such as airstrikes and the space ray to repel waves of alien invaders in this sci-fi tower defense game.

name: Bear Soul
description: Bear Soul is a game where you pass levels and fight against evil in various shapes, rescue your cub from the wizard's hands and bring peace to the forest. Bear Soul is divided into several games, each contains its own characters, mechanics and storyline, but they all are parts of the entire universe. This is the first game in the franchise, the beginning of the whole story and an incredible adventure.

name: Cat Dog Adventure Casual RPG
description:
A simple system that makes it easy to become stronger!
Easy operation with command battle!
Make your favorite team with cute cats!
Let's enjoy playing this game in your free time!

Cats have a big adventure in a loose world!

name: PixKeeper
description: You play as ordinary guys, just like you! Awaken your strategic thinking, mentor, hero, and defender! Upgrade your heroes, learn, set goals, explore secret blueprints, defeat the Lord, protect the kingdom!

name: Speedpunk
description: Welcome to the future. In the world where cars are flying. Pickup helmet, fasten your seat belts and fly as fast as you can. Race on different planets. Earn as much stars as you can in each level. Beat other players and become most popular flying car driver. Take your car, it is free-to-play.

name: Duck Flighting
description: Duck Flighting may just be the ultimate experience in duck hunting simulation! And if it's not ultimate, we definitely guarantee it's an experience of some sort! With guns to fire, ducks to hunt, and a gorgeous nature scene to enjoy, we wish you all a fun time with our little project.

name: Calculate It!
description: CALCULATE IT is a casual math puzzle game with various mathsymbols, which is based on the calculator. You need to make a target number with your logic skills and creativity.

name: In My Defense
description: This is a challenging, old-school, retro, side-scrolling shooter. The player must defend the base against 28 waves of alien attackers. There are also 10 bonus twin-stick shooter levels, where the player controls a security robot defending the base from enemies tunneling in from below.

name: Big Farm Story
description: Build your dream farm with your friends & animals in Big Farm Story. Grow crops, tend your fields, craft and explore the world in this farming adventure. Meet new friends around each corner, shape your own community and have fun writing your own story.

name: Directional Isolation VR
description: Directional Isolation is a VR game that allows you to experience space as a spaceship captain. You have no crew and no idea where to go. Thankfully, your ship has a personalized A.I onboard named C.A.I.S.N. Explore and travel through the Ulrich asteroid fields with only curiosity leading the way.

name: Who Stole My Beard?
description: Inspired by classic point-and-click adventure games of the past, Who Stole My Beard is a casual game suitable for all ages! Your beard has been stolen! You and your loyal dog Leo must investigate the people and places of Beardsville to solve the crime. Uncover conspiracies, find new beards, and don't forget to pick up the groceries in this charming town of bearded intrigue.

name: Grime
description: Explore a surreal world obsessed with proportions and anatomy, in this 2.5D Metroidvania action RPG, where you will find out what you're made of... and break everything else apart.

name: Teleport Jumper
description: You are trapped in an underground maze. The only way out is through the exit portal but how do you get there? Fortunately, you have a short-range teleport that will help you bypass obstacles and reach your goal. You have a limited number of teleports in each level. Think carefully and plan ahead.

name: O Conto de Ada
description: O Conto de Ada is a textual mobile game, based on an original science-fiction story, where your choices define your paths within the game. Through an immersive narrative and soundtrack, you take on the role of Ada, an aerospace engineer responsible for researching and terraforming planets. His companions on this mission are Iatso, a monitoring artificial intelligence, and Azazel, a grumpy diary robot. In this context you will embark on an interplanetary space exploration knowing more about yourself and the universe from the choices you make.

name: Mais um Dia!
description: Explore a 3D world with hand-drawn animated 2D characters. Witness the mundane daily life of the future. Talk with the inhabitants of the sector and discover their stories.

name: Star Revenge 11: Star Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Data Delivery Agents
description: An edutainment puzzle game about the principles of ubiquitous connectivity. Help Ebi deliver packets across the world wide web; build paths using directional tiles across over 30 different levels.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story Three - Jane Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Samurai Rising
description: In SamuraiRising, your NFT battlecard is the heart of the game. It provides utility and value to the SamuraiLegends ecosystem. Your battlecards fight against another player's deck, or a bot, to be able to earn $KOKU points. In this setting, gamers who play regularly and strategically, will acquire more Koku Points.

name: The Tower
description: A tower defense with more than meets the eyes. The Tower is an incremental tower defense game where you will control a single tower. Defend your tower until its destruction, make permanent upgrades to it, then give it another try! Construct the perfect tower of defense.

name: Yurivania 0: Soul Night Prelude
description:
Monstergirls work together to help out some lost ghosts~!

The Midnight Palace is hosting a major ritual to assist spirits navigating the realms beyond mortality. Tibby the skeleton is planning on attending and really wants her friend Stheno to come along. To get there on time, they will have to work together to overcome some unexpected obstacles, maybe making a new friend along the way!

Gather as much spirit energy as you can find, and maybe Stheno will build up the courage to as a very important question!

name: Fallen London: The Tempest
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2021.

name: Zen Match
description: A nature inspired match-3 game with relaxing music. Unlock tiles and backgrounds as you progress. Also collect tokens to decorate rooms and create your own zen spaces.

name: Threads of Magic
description: A casual, narrative peek into the life of a tailor creating costumes for queer magical girls and boys.

name: Mini Blaster
description:
Mini Blaster is an arcade shooter with minimal graphics.
Raise the level and get upgrade, strengthen your ship and defeat the approaching enemies.

name: Zephyrus
description: Cooperative action-puzzler in virtual reality.

name: Saving Ghost
description: Get the ghost out of here under false charge. - Maybe it doesn't require much patience.

name: Sedomairi
description: Sedomairi is a first-person action horror game in which you wander through a randomly generated world that looks like an old Japanese house. Use the radio that can detect the distance and direction of the enemy to escape from the enemy, catch all the straw figures, and escape from the Sedo.

name: Truffle Hogs
description: Truffle Hogs is a free-to-play, mobile multiplayer game where you can hang out and play with friends. Search for buried truffles or steal them from other players! Decorate your treehouse, unlock cool hats, or just run around emoting.

name: Cube-e
description: Cube-e - platformer on accuracy with a change in gravity, performed in 2D graphics.

name: Missing Bullet
description: This is a first person action game,The player needs to survive as long as possible, the player has bow and arrow, shield, knife as weapons.,,Players are free to explore the surrounding area.Survive as long as possible!

name: Dice Girls: Lying Dice
description: And three different character of the United States play together big dice dice this very interesting game. Big dice is also called braggart dice, is a very popular bar dice game in China. If you win, the pretty girls can take off one piece of clothing.

name: Where Is My Mom
description: Where Is My Mom is a side-scrolling game tells a story about the fate of a girl who was stolen.The chapters are divided into stories that differ in gameplay and mechanics: the main mechanics of the game are puzzles but there are also stealth mechanics and horror elements at play as well.

name: Recursive Hate: Spider Hell
description: Try to survive in Spider Hell. Fight with big, realistic and terrifying spiders and versus swarms with literally thousands of spiders.

name: Stories of Mara
description: Explore the everyday life in Mara through unique tales in this slice of life visual novel. Step into the shoes of a diverse cast and get to know the struggles and desires of the inhabitants of this modern-fantasy world set in a tropical archipelago.

name: Really Weird Pool
description: Really Weird Pool is all the fun of normal pool but with weird shaped tables. Play with friends or strangers online or locally, or play against the computer.

name: Welcome to the Polyverse
description: Robert Kane, convinced he is living in a simulation, will do anything he has to in order to get out. He must stop at nothing to unlock the secrets of this world and accomplish his goal.

name: Cardboard Invasion
description: Cardboard Invasion is a FPS Tower Defense game set in the world of imagination. Set out on an adventure on your own or with friends to defend Cardboard Land from invading forces by constructing defensive towers, calling in reinforcements, equipping special weapons and more...

name: Demons of Asteborg
description: Demons of Asteborg is a new original and challenging 2D-platform game mixing action, little puzzles and strategy coming soon for the SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis, Windows, Mac, Linux and Nintendo Switch. This 16-bit game will bring back many memories to the retro-lovers.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: In The Belly of The Beast
description: The second episode in the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series.

name: Turbo Tomato
description: Fast, one or two player co-op arcade action in worlds packed with power ups and crazed mutant fruit and vegetables.

name: Soaked in Blood
description: A TWID-esque Ultimate Doom episode replacement, Soaked in Blood! It's a vanilla mapset in the style of Knee-Deep in the Dead with some modern twists. Ultra-Violence is the preferred difficulty though feel free to pick what suits your skills.

name: Souseishi, Arui wa Doukoku no Mokushiroku: Incarnation Erased from History
description: Touhou-style independent shooting game featuring original characters and world.

name: Resident Evil 3: Dark Infection
description: Sin descripción

name: That Night
description: That Night is a short PSX horror game. You're a girl in the 90's that one night decided to take a walk in a road in the middle of the forest. The more you progress, the more you hear voices of something that is following you.

name: All of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
description: This bundle includes all the works related to the Touhou Mystia's Izakaya series.

name: Unicorn Break
description: Unicorn Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out fantasy themed items with a unique cloud paddle and heart shaped ball. Unique animated levels, mini-bosses and powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Hidden Expedition: A King's Line
description:
Domini Games presents a deep dive into a legendary tale and the search for truth in this exciting new entry in the Hidden Expedition series!

When wealthy philanthropist Preston Rutland unveils his plans to build a state-of-the-art scientific research facility at a controversial landmark in England, the H.E.L.P. assigns you to protect the land by proving that it’s the final resting place of the legendary King Arthur. But there’s only one problem—to do that, you’ll have to prove that Arthur was a real person in the first place! To make matters worse, you only have ten days to accomplish the impossible by solving a mystery that has eluded historians for centuries. Who was the real King Arthur? Get ready to explore the stories of Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table like never before in this intriguing Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Sweet Punch
description: In a world full of elves, orcs and sirens, you want to find your perfect match... But it can't be anyone! Your partner must be just as awesome as you! Get hit with your crushes and discover love in Sweet Punch!

name: Secure
description: A block pushing game with a mysterious goal.

name: Butterflies Episode 2: Getting Up
description:
Japan is one of only two countries never to have had a successful revolution in its history.

Butterflies is a game about inline skating and graffiti. Apparently some people did that before, but they don't seem like they'll be doing it anymore.

name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Battle Tendency
description: The second part of the JoJo's Bizarre RPG series. This game is based on the second major arc of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki. Play as Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, and uncover the mysteries behind the origins of the stone mask, its creators and the history of Hamon.

name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Phantom Blood
description: A fan-made RPG about JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki. Play as Jonathan Joestar and experience the first major arc of the series in the style of a Final Fantasy-like RPG game.

name: Parquet
description: In the near future, a technology called Brain-Machine Interface connects the brain and machines. This technology brings about a new paradigm and opens the gates to the digitization of human memory itself. From these new discoveries, "he" is born.

name: 23 Seconds to 5
description:
Experience (crazy,) bizarre, surreal environments in virtual reality.
Watch your way carefully! Jump, slide, avoid the obstacles … Master the challenges in the different obstacle courses and hope that you will reach the elevator of the tower.

In "23 Seconds to 5" you run linearly through desert environments, pirate areas and greenhouses with dangerous pitfalls. You explore the surface of the moon, underwater landscapes and futuristic high-rise districts. In the depths of a mine you will be led through dark corridors and caves. Night and horror await you too. Be careful. You will also encounter pyramids, artistic design and abstraction on your way. Do not be distracted, dangers lurk between all the diversity and beauty.

description: The game's system is somewhere between air combat and naval warfare. It's a lot like the old game I played as a kid, and we control fighters to destroy the enemy's fleet. The DLC include mission pack 004.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies to win the game. The DLC include map pack 019.
